instruction: Given the following song lyrics, provide a title for the song. Output "title: <title>"
input:
Verse 1
And I dream, of your love, sweet and tender
It sounds, like a song, of an angel
Coming down, from the sky, up above
Every night, I hope you're in my dreams

Chorus 1
Baby hold my heart, and never let go
Be my everything just like you know

Verse 2
The feelings that I have, in my heart
Can't be broken by the two of us apart

Chorus 2
Always be with me, it's what I pray
Singing all my songs, love and stay
output: title: Sweet Tender Angel (Love and Stay)
